title: Good but contribution is limited
review:
Summary:
The paper proposed to divide a network into multiple parts and distill each part sequentially. The purpose is to improve the distillation performance when the teacher network is deep.

Quality:
- I think the multi-stage idea makes sense and I agree it can improve the accuracy. But the improvement seems to be very limited. More experiments would be necessary to justify its value.
- Also, the stage-by-stage approach might also produce more overhead in computation. More analysis is needed for the computation.

Clarity:
- The paper is a bit hard to follow especially in the "observations" part, even though eventually I managed to get the core idea of the paper.

Originality:
- The contribution is incremental.
- I feel the multi-stage idea has been used extensively.

Significance:
I believe the paper could be improved significantly in order to produce desired impact.
rating: 4: Ok but not good enough - rejection
confidence: 4: The reviewer is confident but not absolutely certain that the evaluation is correct
